World Health Organization trying to get access to Gaza hospital after raidThe World Health Organization (WHO) said on Friday it was trying to get access to biggest functioning hospital in Gaza, the Nasser Hospital, after an Israeli raid. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 10:10:44 GMT VF5LF6K4ABLELOQ6OBF3Q7E45M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-health-organization-trying-get-access-gaza-hospital-after-raid-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中东
South Korean president's office says handling of heckler within lawSouth Korean security guards were acting within the law when they removed a man who was heckling President Yoon Suk Yeol as he was making a speech at a university graduation ceremony, the president's office said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 10:05:57 GMT 735XGCXV7FLEPLOL2NUOX4E2JU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korean-presidents-office-says-handling-heckler-within-law-2024-02-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Belgian PM backs EU bonds to boost defence spendingJoint European Union borrowing could help fund higher defence spending but governments would still have to make tough political choices to sustain it, Belgian Prime Minister Alexander De Croo said. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 09:59:19 GMT LUNRLPHKNZM67AFBC732QNVLRA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belgian-pm-backs-eu-bonds-boost-defence-spending-2024-02-16/Andrew Gray世界欧洲
Belarus' Lukashenko says 'saboteurs' detained on border with UkraineBelarusian President Alexander Lukashenko said on Friday that several "saboteurs", including Ukrainian and Belarusian nationals, had been detained earlier on Friday on the border of the two countries in a "counter-terrorist operation". Fri, 16 Feb 2024 09:27:02 GMT BVGSVPE5S5LYFH6PACXB7BYIIY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belarus-lukashenko-says-saboteurs-detained-border-with-ukraine-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Indonesian president's son also rises, but what will his role as new VP be?Everything about Indonesia's 36-year-old presumed incoming vice president - from his looks and mannerisms to his baritone voice - is reminiscent of his father, the outgoing and wildly popular President Joko Widodo, known as Jokowi. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 09:10:25 GMT ADUZKKIKDNI7HPEVUPYJT5U7FI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesian-presidents-son-also-rises-what-will-his-role-new-vp-be-2024-02-16/Ananda Teresia, Kate Lamb世界亚太地区
US senators to visit Hungary pushing Sweden's NATO bidA bipartisan U.S. Congressional delegation will visit Hungary on Sunday as pressure grows on Budapest to ratify Sweden's NATO membership when parliament reconvenes after its winter break. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 08:44:46 GMT BRDGDHNZZZKTPHN3RLAGC77BEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us-senators-visit-hungary-pushing-swedens-nato-bid-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Prominent Ukrainian army unit launches own recruitment drive to strengthen ranksWith its military ranks wearing thin, Ukraine is struggling to overhaul mobilisation and broaden recruitment as the second anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion approaches. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 07:50:23 GMT T7VTPOVXPRLE7C4MSH7WWJ33RA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/prominent-ukrainian-army-unit-launches-own-recruitment-drive-strengthen-ranks-2024-02-16/Dan Peleschuk世界欧洲
Myanmar junta's conscription plan lays bare toll of fighting rebelsThe Myanmar's military conscription plan reveals the heavy toll that months of incessant fighting against rebels have had on its troops and the struggles the generals are facing to replenish their ranks, analysts, diplomats and a defector said. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 07:40:16 GMT CUGBMFQRPFM65PZDHAACQB3CME https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-juntas-conscription-plan-lays-bare-toll-fighting-rebels-2024-02-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Indonesia's Prabowo has made no decision on energy subsidies, says aideIndonesia's likely new president Prabowo Subianto has been advised to improve budget efficiency to make way for spending priorities, but has not made a decision on adjusting sensitive energy subsidies, a senior member of his team said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:09:50 GMT 55PSYFX2IFIVJA634WUV2LZC44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-prabowo-has-made-no-decision-energy-subsidies-says-aide-2024-02-16/Ananda Teresia世界亚太地区
Wars in Israel, Ukraine to dominate global security summit in MunichLeading politicians, military officers and diplomats from around the world gather in Munich on Friday for a security conference that will be dominated by the wars in Israel and Ukraine as well as fears over the U.S. commitment to defending its allies. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:06:03 GMT XX6LYO32P5P67FRPGS6MD6GOZE https://www.reuters.com/world/wars-israel-ukraine-dominate-global-security-summit-munich-2024-02-16/Sarah Marsh, Humeyra Pamuk世界
Egypt setting up area at Gaza border which could be used to shelter Palestinians, sources sayEgypt is preparing an area at the Gaza border which could accommodate Palestinians in case an Israeli offensive into Rafah prompts an exodus across the frontier, four sources said, in what they described as a contingency move by Cairo. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:47:33 GMT 2U5WH3EQUVKMNFAYZ2FATPVA3A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egypt-setting-up-area-gaza-border-which-could-be-used-shelter-palestinians-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中东
